A lightweight command-line tool to lookup DMR IDs for amateur radio callsigns using [radioid.net](https://www.radioid.net/).

- ğŸ” Lookup one or more callsigns
- ğŸ“‹ Pretty table output with `--pretty`
- ğŸ“‚ Save results to CSV with `--save filename.csv`
- âš¡ Fast and lightweight
- ğŸ› ï¸ Automatic virtual environment handling
- ğŸš€ Easy installation and global CLI access

pip install dmrid-lookup
